title: Fix your damned client
body:
I have had your client close out on me multiple times this week, because it randomly stops working during a ranked game champion select, and now i can't play for thirty minutes. I have repaired it multiple times and it is not fixed, please fix your damn client before you make any more skins or or champs, or nerf or buff any of the current champs. 

You have people throwing money at the screen for a free to play game, but it still has issues like this,along with the pvp.net disconnects during champ select, which also cost me and many other people LP and game time.

replies.body:
Hello Copernicus182,

I can completely understand how frustrating and aggravating this issue is, especially during Ranked Games where you can lose LP.  Keep in mind however that issues such as you are describing are not due to the inherent coding of the Client, but rather an issue with your connection.

Champion Select is the one place where you need to have a consistent connection, otherwise you will face serious errors/issues, such as the ones you have experienced.  This is the case because not only does your computer need to communicate to the Server properly, but the Server then needs to take your information, and provide it to the 9 other Summoners in the same game.  To that end, make sure that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article in hopes of resolving this issue:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21696815

If you are still getting docked LP for errors in Champion Selection, even after completing all of these steps, then please do not hesitate to let us know in Player Support by submitting a new [Support Ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).  Make sure that you include the following Network Logs in your ticket as well:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
